name: Interllingua Translation Services
tag_list: professional-translation-services, localization-services, specialized-translation, international-development-translations, tourism-translations, environmental-translations, academic-translations, marketing-translations, english-translations, german-transl
overview: Professional translation and localization services specialized in international development, tourism, the environment, academic and marketing translations in English, German, French, Spanish, Arabic and Portuguese. Legal and sworn translation of official documents by professional legal translators specialized in translating contracts, business and immigration documents. Translation of documents specific to the area of international development cooperation, human rights and public policy. Translation of documents for the sector of the environment, renewable energies, wind farms, climate change, recycling. Translation of all types of texts for the sector of tourism, such as web sites, tourist guides, press releases, brochures, restaurant menus, business correspondence. Translation of academic texts, doctoral theses, essays, studies, opinion papers and prose for the academic community, universities, think tanks, public and private institutions. Translation and localization of marketing materials, press releases, magazines, media kits, advertisements.
